data.name: Band Space
data.description:
Band Space is an online co-op VR rhythm game. You can play drum sets, guitar, keyboard or bass on shining stages. Team up with a band, make friends and become rock stars!

ğŸ”¥ Version 1.0 is out now with lots of free bonuses. Download it now!

Game Features:
â— Multiplayer mode with voice chat
â— 4 instruments with unique gameplay
â— 5 different performance environments
â— Unique lighting atmosphere for each song
â— Weekly updates with free songs
â— Import your own custom songs

Join our Discord now: https://discord.com/invite/HWbeUGfVpD
Talk to other players, share your custom map, and chat directly with the developers!
